channel.title: Projects on Thomas Oakley
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Thomas Oakley

item.title: Project I: Spin Rate Analysis
item.description: Project Explanation A project in which we look deeper into MLB pitchers Fastball Spin Rates and Off-Speed Spin Rates. Collecting the Data The data used in this week’s project was pulled from baseball savant. Our list included qualified pitchers from 2018, 2019, and 2020. The total amount of entries that met these conditions was 158. We then sorted the pitchers from highest to lowest spin rates and removed the players that were among the top fifty pitchers in fastball spin rate.

item.title: Project II: Constructing a Formula to Predict Future Success
item.description: Project Explanation In this project we will construct a formula in which we predict which current minor league players will have future success. We will use older data to see how well our formula does. Collecting the Data For this project, we took data from two different sources for the purpose of discovering how well our formula did in two different circumstances. For the first dataset, 2012, we chose the top 20 prospects for each team as listed on MLB.

item.title: Project III: Airbnb Prices in New York City
item.description: Project Explanation Through this project were mostly focusing on cleaning a large dataset and cleaning it and drawing statistical inferences from it. This project will be show from screenshots from a Jupyter Notebook in which I explain my rationale with every step.
